Title: New Mexico Legislature: Amend the sex offender laws to state that no registered sex offender may live in a home with children present.
Overview: Current New Mexico law allows a convincted sex offender to live in a home with children present unless the offender is on probation. This puts untold numbers of children at risk.
Signature Count: Amend the sex offender laws to state that no registered sex offender may live in a home with children present.
